short_desc: Offers a Bereavement Ministry, Marriage Ministry, Restoration Ministry and The Brotherhood (all men are invited)
description: The following ministries are offered in the Learning Center: The Restoration Ministry meets on Thursday at 7pm. If struggling with any negative habits, addictions or lifestyles, ministry is offered Wednesday, 7pm. The Bereavement Ministry offers help with the loss of loved ones, and meets Tuesday, 7-8pm. The Brotherhood meets on the first and third Thursday of the month at 7pm; all men are invited. The Marriage Ministry meets on the second and fourth Tuesday of the month at 7pm. The Healthy Temple Department continues providing free health education information every 1st, 2nd, and 4th Thursday, 7-9pm.
